abstract: On the whole, contributors to an interactive project about the economic outlook seemed slightly more hopeful about their own prospects than about the overall economy.
snippet: On the whole, contributors to an interactive project about the economic outlook seemed slightly more hopeful about their own prospects than about the overall economy.
lead_paragraph: Contradictory data are nothing new in economics, but amid the slump in the United States and Europe, readers may find themselves paying increasing attention to indicators that seem to point every which way.
